name: Dark Reddit - Black & Red
description:
Great for reading at night. See screenshots.

===Changelog===
1.06 (June 4, 2010)
- Trying to fix some bugs

1.05 (July 3, 2009)
- Fixed bad coloring on top tabs
- Fixed bad coloring for user text

1.04 (January 2, 2009)
- Added comment guidelines
- Updated "after" screenshot

1.03 (December 29)
- Removed ads
- Changed moderator button to match background

1.02 (December 8)
- Changed Title links to red and all other links to white

1.01 (December 7)
- Replaced header image (constant now)
- Added big NSFW tag-- because you don't want to be caught unaware... :P
- Made subreddit title more visible on pages (besides the header image, the subreddit name is in a green tab)

1.00 (December 5)
- Link hover color is RED for titles, and GREEN for everything else
- Visited links are GRAY and have a line through them

Please report any bugs you find... and post reviews!
